Class BundlesAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • actions.osgi.BundlesAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action, ValidationAware, LocaleProvider, TextProvider, Validateable, Serializable, BundleContextAware

    public class BundlesAction
extends ActionSupport
implements BundleContextAware
    This action shows how to interact with the OSGi container, using the OSGi interceptor
